selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: Compute numeric expressions to find the measure of angle BOC using known angle properties.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to calculate the measure of angle BOC by applying the triangle angle sum property and properties of angle bisectors.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer to match the required output format.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use to format the computed measure of angle BOC into the specified answer format.

new_skill_specs.name: analyze_triangle_properties
new_skill_specs.purpose: Analyze the properties of a triangle given its angles and bisectors to determine unknown angles.
new_skill_specs.outputs: Dictionary containing calculated angles and properties.
